thread.title: Queen Latifah, Smokey Robinson to help Obamas celebrate arts - The Olympian
thread.title_full: Queen Latifah, Smokey Robinson to help Obamas celebrate arts - The Olympian - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: The Olympian
title: Queen Latifah, Smokey Robinson to help Obamas celebrate arts - The Olympian
text:
Queen Latifah, Smokey Robinson and Trombone Shorty are among the performing artists who will help celebrate the arts at the White House on Wednesday. They will be joined by Usher, James Taylor, Audra McDonald and others for a PBS special hosted by President Barack Obama and his wife, Michelle.
 The Olympian.
